full_summary:
# [6D063-234765] Dual Mode Biosafety Cabinet

### TENDER DETAILS

* **Reference Number:** WS4245576361-Doc4265450559
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4245576361
* **Publication Date:** November 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 21, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 14, 2024

### PROCUREMENT DETAILS

* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None

### DELIVERY DETAILS

* **Regions of Delivery:** Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada

### CONTRACTUALРА.ddETAILS

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** [Oana Lee](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Department:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) / Veterinary Technical Services (VTS)
* **End-User Department:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) / Veterinary Technical Services (VTS)

### PROJECT DESCRIPTTION

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) / Veterinary Technical Services (VTS) is seeking a Dual Mode Biosafety Cabinet. The requirement is for a dual mode cabinet capable of use in both Class II and Class III laboratory environments. The end-users will primarily be program staff (VTS staff, lab clients such as scientists and lab technicians), who will use the equipment to conduct animal manipulations and sample collection.

### ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS

* A detailed description of the product proposed and any accompanying documentation, such as a datasheet, operating manual, or any other relevant material.
* Bid submission must be received by December 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST to be considered responsive. Any late bids will be excluded from consideration.

### WHERE TO GET MORE INFORMATION

A full tender package can be accessed from the Government of Canada e- procurement service at the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18042161?extsite=MTgwNDIxNjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](
